titles.title: Reconciliation Reform Amendments
A resolution to amend the Rules of the House of Representatives to prohibit the inclusion of extraneous matters in reconciliation bills.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Rules.

bill.summary: 1/21/1987--Introduced. Reconciliation Reform Amendments - Amends rule XXI of the Rules of the House of Representatives to prohibit extraneous matters in reconciliation bills considered pursuant to the most recently agreed to concurrent resolution on the budget.
